channel.title: [508] Problem making an account Admin?
channel.description:
Alright, so up to now I've been doing 317s. I JUST started with 508s, and I recently downloaded the extium-pkz source. (It is a 508.) I have looked everywhere for a TUT on how to do this, and read through maybe 15 of them, but I can't seem to get it to work. I open up my source folder and get 3 folders: [b]bin[/b] (this has the compile and run cmds.) [b]build src[/b] Inside [b]"build"[/b] I find: banned characters connection accts connection dates items mapdata npcs noclip.cfg I have been told that in order to make an account admin/owner or whatever, I have to go into "characters>mainsave." So i go into mainsave and find my account (the only one, obviously.) I open the "accountname".dat file with notepad to get this:
username:"ACCOUNTNAME" password:"PASSSSWORRRD" ip:"IP IP IP IP IP" rights:0 starter:1 jailed:0 [size=10pt]...and so on...[/size]
I change the rights to "2" then save. I log into my account and nothing has changed. I am lost. :( Help would be [b]Greatly[/b] appreciated. Thanks in advance. (:

item.title: [508] Problem making an account Admin?
item.dc:creator: @urbaninja urbaninja
item.description:
@urbaninja wrote:

kk i think i know how to fix this go into your login.java adn search for if (p.username.equals( then change the name to yours for example…

if (p.username.equals("mase")) { p.rights = 2;

change the mase to watever your name is.

hope it helped

item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

make sure you are offline when you edit the character file…

item.title: [508] Problem making an account Admin?
item.dc:creator: @cal01 cal01
item.description:
@cal01 wrote:

Alright, so up to now I’ve been doing 317s. I JUST started with 508s, and I recently downloaded the extium-pkz source. (It is a 508.) I have looked everywhere for a TUT on how to do this, and read through maybe 15 of them, but I can’t seem to get it to work.

I open up my source folder and get 3 folders:
bin (this has the compile and run cmds.)
build
src

Inside “build” I find:
banned
characters
connection accts
connection dates
items
mapdata
npcs
noclip.cfg

I have been told that in order to make an account admin/owner or whatever, I have to go into “characters>mainsave.” So i go into mainsave and find my account (the only one, obviously.)

I open the “accountname”.dat file with notepad to get this:

username:"ACCOUNTNAME" password:"PASSSSWORRRD" ip:"IP IP IP IP IP" rights:0 starter:1 jailed:0 [size=10pt]...and so on...[/size]

I change the rights to “2” then save. I log into my account and nothing has changed. I am lost. Help would be Greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance. (:

Read full topic
